context: Hi, what movies do you like?

Hi Well, I like scary movies, but I am looking for something family appropriate. I liked Despicable Me (2010), Despicable Me 2 (2013) , and Despicable Me 3 (2017) but not Minions (2015) Plus it doesn't have to be animated
resp: Sure, I'd recommend Incredibles 2 (2018) and Christopher Robin (2018) from this year.

context.content: Hi there! Do you have a preference for a specific type of movie or genre?
I love thrilling action, daring adventure, and playful animation all in one movie! Do you have any recommendations for a movie that covers all these genres?

context.content: Based on your preferences, I recommend "Avatar" for its thrilling action, daring adventure, and playful animation. Enjoy!
That sounds awesome! Can you tell me more about "Avatar"?
context.feelings: I'm excited to explore "Avatar" for its thrilling action, daring adventure, and playful animation. I can't wait to experience the adrenaline-pumping scenes and imaginative storytelling. The recommender did a great job understanding my preferences!

context.content: "Avatar" is a visually stunning science fiction film directed by James Cameron. It combines thrilling action, daring adventure, and captivating animation in a story set on the alien world of Pandora. The movie follows the journey of a paralyzed former marine who becomes involved in a conflict between the indigenous Na'vi people and a mining corporation. It's a must-see for fans of action, adventure, and animation!

That sounds amazing! I can't wait to watch "Avatar" and experience the thrilling action, daring adventure, and playful animation on the alien world of Pandora. Thank you so much for the recommendation! [END]
context.feelings: I'm thrilled to explore the alien world of Pandora and experience the daring adventure and captivating animation in "Avatar." It sounds like the perfect movie that covers all my preferred genres. I can't wait to watch it! [END]

simulator_dialog.resp: Sure, I'd recommend Incredibles 2 (2018) and Christopher Robin (2018) from this year.
